That kind of formal speak could only mean that she came from a noble clan.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s okay. You&#39;re the second one here, so second best is not too bad.&#34;</font> He admits, with a smile, before he steps forth to raise a hand. A fist bump is sought.

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m Hajime.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00>Senju, Kurorama observed the hand, though she made no attempts to meet it in the same manner. Though, amusement began to creep into her eyes, almost as if she was trying to unwrap a potential puzzle the greeting had presented her with.

<font color = white>&#34;I wasn&#39;t told this was a competition. I would have deigned to try harder if I had.&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;Kurorama.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Too good for a fist bump?&#34;</font> He asks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00>Senju, Kurorama cantered her head to the side.

<font color = white>&#34;Ah. That&#39;s what this is? Understood.&#34;</font>

Mental conditioning was strong in this one, though he wasn&#39;t ruled by it.

<font color = white>&#34;I do, too... Just don&#39;t push yourselves too much, hard work is fine until you pull a muscle. It happens to everyone eventually.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> Of course I do.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#663300>With her customary pleasant expression, Shishorama reached out her hand to the gentle-mannered adolescent. Despite the considerable age difference, she remained unfazed and undaunted by his company. On the contrary, she felt a heightened sense of responsibility to converse with him, as he was likely merely a non-clan member who was struggling to get by in the Academy.

The need to protect this individual only grew.

<font color = white>&#34;A pleasure to meet you, Kaoru! I&#39;m THE Senju, Shishorama! Will you be joining us in the Academy? I don&#39;t see a headband anywhere.&#34;</font><br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000c1];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #663300;">Senju, Shishorama - The intense youngster</a>)</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Instead of feeding mouths, we shinobi solves and prevent those farmer&#39;s problems from interrupting them making harvest.&#34;</font>

A hand extended facing the handed tool, as it suddenly came back to her grasp. <font color = white>&#34;To do that, we practice and master the use of all life force Chakra. Before we git to all that...&#34;</font>

The woman places the hoe back to her rear, facing the memorial.

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><font color = white> Well-prepared. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> reaches into his pocket, only to withdraw ten dice. Ten dice that were quite worn, battered, and barely legible.

But they would work, if you squinted hard enough. 

A sly grin forms.

<font color = white>&#34;How about it? You can bet your 11 ryo.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> I find that a large vocabulary permits for a more eloquent, and nuanced debate as far as speaking goes.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> What are you debating?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> All manner of things, of course. Well, in theory at least.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> <i>gasps.</i>

Immediately, she clutched her precious eleven bucks tight, like a mother hen concealing chicks beneath their wing. Protective! Suspecting! Aggressive!
 
<font color = white>&#34;Betting?! My day&#39;s earnings? On a game like this?! I--&#34;</font>

She paused, to heed the large words of the officer. Her expression blanched, blanked, with nothing but radio static playing in her mind. 

<font color = white>&#34;..err. What she said. All those terrible things will happen if I wage my ryo! But.. if I must.. I&#39;ll bet ten! Not my special eleventh ryo.&#34;</font> </font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Only ten!</font></font></font></span></span>

Watching students gamble was a humble, yet respected pasttime.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> smiles sweetly, tilting his head a bit. He was hiding his nefarious plan of acquiring her eleventh, special ryo.

<font color = white>&#34;Sure..! We can do 10. Your ten against my ten. How&#39;s that sound?&#34;</font> He asks, as he holds onto the dice tight and suddenly rolls them onto the ground.

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m Hajime, by the way.&#34;</font> 

A simple introduction, as his eyes focus entirely on the rolling structures, until they land on....!!!!!</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> scooped up the dice!
<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m Hanako. Unrelated and slightly wealthy!&#34;</font>

<i>But. For exactly how long?</i>
Dice rattled about in her cupped hands. 

<font color = white>&#34;Um. Gambling isn&#39;t illegal. Is it?&#34;</font> She side-eyed the cop. <font color = white>&#34;You&#39;re not sitting there because you wanna arrest us after, right?&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;.. Hrmm.. scuffed-up, and-.. cheaply made?&#34;</font> Her viseage goes lax as she tosses the D-20 back down. <font color = white>&#34;If he stole them, I doubt anyone cares.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><font color = white>&#34;Chosen rival?&#34;</font>

He leans back a tad, and his resentment vanishes. He stares at her absent-mindedly for a few moments.

<font color = white>&#34;I don&#39;t have a chosen rival. I&#39;m going to be the best.&#34;</font> He states, bluntly, before finally returning to the game.

<font color = white>&#34;That means, beating everyone else. Clan, or no clan. No exceptions.&#34;</font>

A faint sigh leaves his lips in relief as he realizes that he was not about to be hauled in by the po-po.

<font color = white>&#34;Alright..! Hanako, you done counting? Another successful hustle! Another successful bamboozle!

He extends a hand towards her.

<font color = white>&#34;Good game, Hanako. Pay up. You get to keep your one special ryo, though.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#99ffcc><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=b9351ed3a270ddd5464dcb5ee63a9a1e7cb427e4a5ea97e0622c681fb994b9af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #99ffcc;">The chill young boy</a> yawns. The nap he had was nice.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Hold it. Are you children gambling?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Congratulations.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> produced ten crispy (slightly moistened) bills from her stack. 
<font color = white>&#34;Yes..&#34;</font> 

A brush of thumb fans them out like playing cards. She takes her time inspecting their faces, their authentication codes as per mint standard, admiring their old-man faces. Reflected in their pale green eyes, she could see all the precious memories that brought them together; playing a complicated red-light green-light, and..

    ...and... 

.. actually, that&#39;s about it! Yep. Participation reward, and then the dive into her pocket because she had to go hear a speech. Good times. The best of times. She extended the bills to their new owner, entirely lacking in sadness, despite this departure. 

How could she feel disappointment, seeing the other kid look so giddy over receiving these funds?! Haa. That&#39;s probably the exact same face she wore when she first acquired them. Right?

<font color = white>&#34;.. take good care of these. Remember how good it feels.. to receive ten ryo. Take it from me. I&#39;ve learned.. it&#39;s a feeling that does not last forever.&#34;</font>

Winds thread through her blond locks as she turned her gaze to the sky, akin to a meditative Bodhisattva arriving at an epiphany. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> I see. This decision has caused a severely traumatic scene to unfold.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Halt this.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Gamble with pretend money.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Boy, if you accept those funds, I will punish you thusly.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> nods her head, content with the extended threat.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Ehh? Aren&#39;t all funds made up?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> They&#39;re just paper someone drew faces and numbers on!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Besides. He&#39;s my friend, so I don&#39;t mind if he has them! We&#39;ll call it payment for playing a game with me.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Pretend money has no value in the real world.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> That is a bad mindset, girl.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> &#39;s eyes remain transfixed upon Hanako&#39;s demeanor and her apparent relationship with these bills, that had been acquired after such hard toil, a fierce game of red-light, green-light that was overly complicated but extremely fun. Even so, upon seeing the way that she stares at the money, he simply cannot feel as giddy and elated as he wanted to.

It seems like his plan to get her to go double or nothing, was quickly fading from his mind.

Could he summon forth the guts to take everything from her? To trick her into losing it all? To strip every single penny from her being?

Never had he hustled someone, and been called a friend for it!

He smiles awkwardly.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey... Umm... Friend.. What were you going to buy with this money?&#34;</font> He questions, as he scratches his cheek and suddenly finds the water behind them extremely interesting. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> sagely nods as the results unfold before her. Watching as Hanako speeds through the seven stages of grief was a nostalgic one- she, too, learned the horrors of gambling the hard way. 

<font color = white>&#34;Mm?&#34;</font> She waved off the noble&#39;s concerns. <font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s only the ten ryo I gave them earlier. Besides- people don&#39;t realize the weight money has until its gone.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff7c80"><font color = white> Best to teach &#39;em early, mm&#39;hm.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d9ef0dcddd91d35f08691c43aebe68fea7e138bd721871e520e8dd5d3be8547d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The slender noble</a> offers a light huff, before looking over the woman beside her. It's hard to tell if she's checking her out or wondering what she'd look like on an operating table. Still, she looks at the children, watching them. Judging the boy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> wouldn't think much of the noble's engaged staring; the meaning behind their gaze was unclear, but she wasn't looking for it. With a hum, she, too, directs her attention back on the pair as they resolve(?) their game.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> tilted her head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Uhhh... ten ryo is a lot. A pack of cookies and maybe a carton of milk? Some candy with the leftovers? It&#39;s fine! I probably don&#39;t need it! Eat enough sweets and-- did you know? Your teeth will fall right out when you least expect it.&#34;</font> 

She flashed the red-head a grin! 
There was a stalk lack of missing teeth there. 
In fact, they were in mint condition. 

<font color = white>&#34;.. they&#39;re a pain to grow back. A super major headache. Don&#39;t worry! I&#39;m better off without it. Already over it. More importantly-- weren&#39;t we supposed to be at the mansion? Or.. was that postponed?&#34;</font> 

She leeeeaned sideways, looking past him, trying to make out any crowds in the distance. Sadly, her visual range was severely limited. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> OOCs<font color = white>: [stark lack*]</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Ten ryo can nearly afford one of the cheaper books in my usual bookstore.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ca666fbaf72d8fe2475c95438a72e1d5ff248468c8f2adc712cc5aee169b9a0a style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff7c80;">The police chief</a> a-hems!
<font color = white>&#34;Actually, they switched locations. Follow the water and you&#39;ll find them.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

He just needed to focus on how he would throw her.

His feet dug on the dirt beneath him as they adjusted themselves, and his grip became firm. Alright, he got it. <font color = white>&#34;Oh, and the name&#39;s Yuuto.&#34;</font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Okay okay... I&#39;ll be your lackey for three days if I fail! How&#39;s that sound?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> turned and reached up on the cliff face for any sort of hand hold that would bare his weight even as he slid the fishing rod over his shoulder. He then took a step up, digging the toe of his sandal into the stone face and turning his foot so that he had more surface touching. With a hop he reached another hand-hold and began the systematic climbing of the cliff. He was warmed up now but he was also a little fatigued, so this was just as hard, if not harder, than the first level, and the stakes were much higher. 

Slowly, but surely he worked his way up to the next level. The distance was farther than before but the group was counting on him. Shishorama even cheered for him and let him make the climb first! She trusted him!

The youth winced and hissed as his forearms started to cramp up and his hands went numb with charlie horses but he continued on, stopping only to shake his hands when he felt confident he could hold himself up.

Once Try weakly pulled himself over the top he laid flat on his stomach and took big, gasping breaths for air.

A long moment later the fishing line and scarf were lowered down to the chill boy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> doesn't grab her on the way up, no. She had been fired off with much too much force to try and slow her down. He could only watch as the pale girl shoots up and over him, to which he turns and waddles in place, determining where she would fall.

Her lightness worked to his advantage in this department. It was very simple to ease her falling into a simple motion, swinging himself around with the excess inertia and planting her firmly on the rocky, cliffside ground.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey! I&#39;m coming up after yah!&#34;</font> The Boy unveils his scarves, placing rocks between them to form a sling, he spins the scarves about before launching them up, <font color = white>&#34;Grab &#39;em and dig em into the wall!!&#34;</font> He commands, he wasn&#39;t able to gauge their prowess, but judging from the fact that they&#39;re up there and he&#39;s down here, it&#39;s a well aligned gamble.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><font color = white>&#34;Hmm.&#34;</font> She lazily caught the scarf flung over her, and held it with not nearly the same conviction as her brother. She rolled over and laid on the scarf, trapping it under her body and between her legs as she scooted behind her brother, acting as an anchor to prevent him from sliding back, as long as he kept himself from sliding forward. It was a little extra weight for him, but...

He could handle it, huh?

<font color = white>&#34;Better hurry.&#34;</font> She called. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m letting go in fifteen seconds.&#34;</font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00>Senju, Kurorama observed the given trajectory of the girl-turned missile for the moment, all the way to her zenith. Once Hanako manages to rise up to the next level of the cliff, he suddenly steps forth. With practiced movements, he leaps onto Yuuto and he is boosted upwards...!

<font color = white>&#34;Let&#39;s go...!&#34;</font>

An arm extends, to try to reach the cliff-side, or Shishorama&#39;s hand... Despite the fact that he didn&#39;t actually want to accept her help.

Hopefully, he wouldn&#39;t hesitate in reaching for her and fall to a grave injury!

He was also wet, due to the river they swam through.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>With an eager expression on her face, Shisho stood at the edge of the cliff, her eyes fixed on Yuuto as he prepared to boost the first person up. Shishorama extends her arms out toward the girl and catches her with effort. Gently placing her to the side, she awaits the next person to be assisted.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00>Senju, Kurorama took her turn once Hajime was seen to the top of the plateau. There was very little fanfare as far as she was concerned, her movements almost painfully efficient. And yet, she boosted through Yuuto's assistance, and extended both arms to grasp onto Shishorama, the zenith of her jump only barely missing the height of the ledge. Perfectly calculated to be easy, and swift.

A nod was offered to the pair then, even if she had to lean over the edge a bit to show her gratitude to Yuuto.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Lets do this!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> rolled his eyes, abjuring to their remarks. Though, it seemed they in fact weren&#39;t on the strong suit, food for thought he supposed.

There was an advantage to this feat, however; Shun&#39;Ichi was going to do something unorthodox to his experience: he was attempting to mimick Komo&#39;s Body Flicker, albeit with only the process of controlling chakra.

Assuming the lady wouldn&#39;t simply show him again, Shun&#39;Ichi improvised.
He remembers reading a bit on the tiger seal; the de-facto sign to focus chakra within the human body; Shinobi works was more his sister&#39;s talent, however the prospect of chakra control always intruigued him.
Time to display that feat in full flux; with his feet upon the wall and the centre of balance upon his heart--Shun&#39;Ichi placed his index and middle fingers on each hand together, and closed his eyes.
Five seconds pass, he recognizes a spark of energy within his belly, chakra.
Ten seconds now, each second is taken spreading chakra throughout his body, before sending it primarily to his legs.
Five more seconds, he feels a sensation unfamiliar to his physical body; and it provides slack for his heart, the chakra to his feet seem to be stitching him to the mountain.

Shun&#39;Ichi wastes zero time, he rushed up the mountain all the way to a point just short of the peak, he shifts around glncing at the Chuunin once more.
<font color = white>&#34;Still think I&#39;m not up to par yet?!&#34;</font> He goads, though while doing so, he recognizes a fault in his prowess: <i>Reserve.</i>

Immediately the boy scrambles his hands onto the wall, realizing how much strain he&#39;s just placed on his body with that simple feat. He&#39;s in a huff, relying on his own desperation and the Kaguya duo&#39;s willingness to hang on to remain.</font></font></font>

He was probably  wrong but he had no time to explain before pulling with all his might.</font></font></font>

They had done the hard work getting up there manually and now some ingenuity would help with the others.

He groaned as Hanako let them reel her up without her own help. He was expecting the people to climb up as well, but with two lines it should have been possible.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Wait--&#34;</font>

Oddly enough, upon colliding with the safety rectangles arranged at the bottom of the cliff, one could&#39;ve sworn her frame deformed like elastic. Only to snap back and toss her squarely onto her face. Eating sediment. 

And there--! She lay. Silent--
<font color = white>&#34;..aaaa--I think I was first.&#34;</font> 

--not silent. Oddly energetic, even, entirely ignoring the impact pains!

<font color = white>&#34;Were you keeping track? I, uh, forgot to.&#34;</font> She glanced over her shoulder to the red head, wondering if he managed to arrive undamaged. </font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Out ya&#39; go.&#34;</font> In a few strokes of her free arm, she drags him to the shore, where he&#39;d be free to hoist himself out at his leisure. As for her, well, she exits the water and takes a new position beside the Senju. Over the course of about twenty seconds, there were no longer any beads speckling her skin. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Today was fun, huh?</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Yes. I believe my parents would consider much of what happened today &#39;Quite goofy&#39;, as they&#39;d say.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> creaked his neck upsettingly, moving over toward the mountain top again, <font color = white>&#34;Don&#39;t blame your brother for your mistakes, dumbass..&#34;</font> He affirmed, before climbing the mountain to reach her. She probably hasn&#39;t calmed down, but then again, what did he say that upsetted her so.

He didn&#39;t use chakra this time, getting the feeling he&#39;s going to have to recover slightly in order to flee again.

<font color = white>&#34;And can probably wear you out before you knock me out... Regardless, what did I say?&#34;</font> He questions again, this time showing vulnerability rather than defensiveness, being at her mercy while climbing, subject to any maleficence she may provide.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama - The intense youngster</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> My parents wouldn&#39;t!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> We learned how to use pulleys and, uh, throw each other. </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Skills we will need in the future for sure.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...Doubtfully.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama - The intense youngster</a> randomly chimes into the conversation and fades back out.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> manages to hoist himself up after a few moments, with a few winces here and there. The fat had been extra fat, after all.

He&#39;s immediately twisting his shirt, trying to get extra moisture out of it until he glances at Hanako with a quizzical expression.

<font color = white>&#34;You mind lending me your towel?&#34;</font> He asks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Well...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I had fun.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> tilted her head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Huh? Just air dry. It only takes a minute.&#34;</font> 
She said it as if it were common sense. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Uchiha, Yuuto - The overconfident kid</a> watches the dancer and the punk's interaction with some interest for now, at the very least hoping that there wouldn't be any violence among classmates. Unsure if it happened already since it was out of his sight before.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> There&#39;s something about being sore from hard exercise that just feels good.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I really feel like I accomplished something.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama asks:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Er. Hard exercise?</font></font></font></span></span>

Scaling the cliffs.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> stomped a loose rock, sending a shower of pebbles down on Shun'ichi, his latest words only inflaming her scorn. She wheeled around on her brother, and weighed the pro's and cons of striking him, too. Her blood was boiling with the characteristic lust of her heritage...

They were lucky she was tired from climbing the rocks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Ah.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> side-eyes Hanako.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime - The optimistic, bright boy</a> stares down at his completely drenched self.

He waits approximately sixty seconds, before he glances up at her.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s not happening. Did you...?&#34;</font> 

A brow quirks.

Bizarre!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00>Senju, Kurorama did not speak further on the topic, her lips just pressed together in a thin line.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> says:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Oww owwwiwowwowowowow...</font></font></font></span></span>

Then she snatched him up in some weird sort of way, then he turned to Try.

<font color = white>&#34;You should&#39;ve been here to lift the fat kid that made my rib cage concave.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku - The sable-haired youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> Hopefully, we failed terribly.</font></font></font></span></span>

<font color = white>&#34;Oh, yeah. That too! No towel. Just air dry.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300>Now, he was interested.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> felt around her nape.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> I don&#39;t have a blowhole.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try - The handsome devil</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> That&#39;s good.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama asks:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Are you certain?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku - The sable-haired youth</a> gave a quizzical look towards his cousin, almost like he had to heads.

<font color = white>&#34;What about the family tradition..? Aren&#39;t you spooked of your parents being disappointed- I&#39;ve heard the stories of Uchiha that couldn&#39;t do their Right of Passage...&#34;</font> Kohaku was very obviously from a traditionalist Uchiha family, it showed here even more than his outfit.

Seems this was a glimpse of the Uchiha extreme high standards.

<font color = white>&#34;Then again if it ever came to that I&#39;d help you... just don&#39;t tell anyone, you know how they get if anything is less than perfect.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako - The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Nothing there.</font></font></font></span></span>

Oh no. He felt for Yuuto, he really did. Though he can&#39;t imagine that sort of outcast status, he had no words for a moment... only a long gaze of concern before nodding.

<font color = white>&#34;I-I see, living in the cold shoulder status... That&#39;s the worst, I&#39;d take up Taijutsu and Shurikenjutsu simply to stay away from the tension...

I&#39;m sure you&#39;ll pass their expectations and make them regret it as you climb up the ranks in the name of the Uchiha.&#34;</font> In Kohaku&#39;s family there could be no failures, even a late bloomer could become a genius.

But! Dogs, like most land creatures, enjoyed food. Meat especially. Of that, she is certain, from all those times she&#39;s witnessed strays going nuts over discarded karage. 

Along their travels, she found the trash can in question, right outside the local BBQ joint and--!

With a paper towel bearing hand, she procured some almost-cleaned rib bones, entirely overlooking any repulsed stares from her peers. She went about, waving the bone along, calling out in her sweetest animal-baby-talk tone.

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00">Senju, Kurorama asks:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Er-- which title I&#39;ll address you by, sir?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc9900"><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">Senju, Akitaru - The captain</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#cc9900"><font color = white> I think you&#39;ll decided that, wont you?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">Senju, Akitaru - The captain</a> didn't let his emotion show this was a test.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00>Senju, Kurorama dismissed the notion of family entirely-- in her mind, she hadn&#39;t yet earned the right to address him with familial tone.

<font color = white>&#34;Yes, Commander Senju.&#34;</font>

Not that she usually went first name-basis with people she just met to begin with.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s an honour to finally make acquaintance with you. If you intend to teach at the academy, I&#39;d hope for your guidance.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000b5];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">Senju, Akitaru - The captain</a> let only the slightest hint of a smile creep through upon his face, before it vanished. It was only for a blink, it might even be possiable that she&#39;d missed it, but a single nod of his head is given. 

<font color = white>&#34;I see. I don&#39;t plan to teach, I have other tasks I&#39;ll be handleing, but, if you run into a question you need answered?&#34;</font>

He patted his own chest, indicateing the pocket she had slipped her prize into. </font></font></font>
